description: At present, the prices of both new and used cars have seen a substantial increase. As a result, this project was initiated to determine the most opportune time for the acquisition of my first vehicle.

description: This project started back in 2020 to learn both the backend and theories of cryptocurrencies and learn how to read in via API and machine learning.

title: Synchrotron Project
description: Tests on heavy metal concentrations in mussel were performed at the Canadian Light Source with particle accelerator in Saskatoon, Canada. A member of the team from the beginning of the project with designing project to the end travelling to Saskatoon visiting CLS in order to perform the tests and presenting for audiences including scientists.

title: AWS
description: This is my academic project to learn the basis of AWS.

title: Haskell Project
